column4: how can i manually re-setup sun-java-6 to work with firefox 2 on ubuntu hardy? it aks me to install the plugin, then returns already installed and java applets never render
already installed and ran update alternatives
Ok dude if you open synaptics and do a search for jre what do you?
console output shows it wants to use openjdk even though i changed to sun in update-alternatives
yeah kind of defeats the purpose of this alternatives thing
well its removed, stuck in memory somewhow hmm
soemtimes needs a restart, not often tho
i think we need to find out what firefox actually needs for sun java
it appears to require gcjwebplugin , it will ask for it no matter what
